name: Texas Hold'Up
description:
Texas Hold'up

The red sun is setting over desert landscape. Tumble weed rolls chased by light wind, heat waves make it hard to stand, only cacti everywhere are reaching out to the sun.

The town with saloon, bank and sheriff's office stands in the distance. A band of "up-to-no-goods" looks over from their horses. Cliche Wild West...

Robbers get into the bank. It's a hold up!

Those who are not shot, are tied to their chairs as the criminals get into the vault...

Now it all has come to this...

It's a hard life and double-cross is not rare. Every man is for himself.

DOUBLE CROSS YOUR FRIENDS!

STEAL THE MONEY!

KILL'EM ALL! OR DIE TRYING!

Created by: Aaron Sequeira Chris Pauley Irina Yakunina Jim Koornneef Max Drozd-Bobak Nathan Sequeira Viktor Lototskyi

NOTE:

Game is best played with XBOX or Logitech controllers! Also, invite some friends over. PvP games are more fun that way!
